body_html:
@SANTHAKUMAR91 @Vivienmm @abhirajD @candrwow
I solved this problem with a simple and crude method. I commented out

public void setNumThreads(int num_threads) {
if (tflite != null)
tflite.setNumThreads(num_threads);
}

in ImageClassifier.java directly. And I also commented out

classifier.setNumThreads(newVal);

in Camera2BasicFragment.java.

Then it works. I can build and run the demo.
However, I encounter a new problem. When I open this demo on my mobile phone, it shows "uninitialized classifier or invalid context".
I am really puzzled! And does anyone know the function of the codes I commented out?
